Text: Sorry, I haven't the time. To encode 4 hours of 720p would take about 20 hours on a Core 2 Duo followed by another 12 hours to upload. Maybe with a Quad core processor and a higher broadband speed it might be possible. As programmes are being broadcast every day you need to complete the encode/upload release cycle at least every 24 hours otherwise I start falling behind. With multiple encoding PC's and limitless broadband speed (like they have at the BBC) it's possible to encode everything.

I understand. 468p is still very good tho. Thanks.

(Maybe you can upload in HD after the Olympics have ended? :) )
